modName: Real RaceHeights Dainty Lil Ladies 1dot7 and Dawnguard Compatible
summary: Real RaceHeights - Dainty Lil Ladies 1.7 patch & with or without Dawnguard Compatible.
descriptionHtml:
Real RaceHeights - Dainty Lil Ladies 1.7 patch & with or without Dawnguard Compatible.  Non Dawnguard version available too.  Both in two flavors: nice & petite or not so short!!

Thanks for the 500+ downloads in under 24 hours!!  And those that endorsed thanks too!! 

 If you enjoy this mod, please come back and endorse!!  Endorsements make us all warm n fuzzy and feel validated in the world!!  

**********I\'ve noticed on my game that this mod doesn\'t seem to work if the esm isn\'t the last esm in my load order!  If you see no height change check if the esm isn\'t the last esm right above your first esp.

[img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/2108/tesv2012090122462897.jpg[/img]
  

*** Added Dawnguard/no Dawnguard versions with taller Orc (Orsimer) females.


Makes the females of Skyrim a little shorter than the males.  Ok, a lot shorter but that\'s cool!!  Puts most females @ around 0.8800 (not so short version is around 0.9200) and all male heights are kept at their default heights.  You\'ll notice the children are smaller too, not by much but they all seem to fit in height wise for me and my game!!  This is how I like to play Skyrim and I think it\'s pretty cool but if you don\'t then that\'s cool too!!

Real RaceHeights Dainty Lil Ladies 1dot8 by GR00VYGH0ULIE

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26553

Use the new version if your Skyrim is 1.8 official patch.  Stick with this 1.7 version if not patched!  :D

Plugin is an ESM rather than ESP in order to ensure Skyrim 1.7 compatibility as other height mods in ESP format don\'t seem to work for me (and others I\'ve heard) since the 1.7 patch.

Use NMM to install for easy peasy enjoyment or drop teh ESM in the data folder into YOUR data folder and of course make sure \"real race heights.esm\" is active in your load order.  Also maybe run BOSS afterwards just to be safe!!  Safety is teh awesomez when it comes to adding mods!!

Hope someone likes this mod and isn\'t afraid of petite dainty lil ladies running around their Skyrim!!  Honestly it just makes the big manly menfolk of Skyrim look more like big manly menfolk that they are!!  :P 

Added Real RaceHeights - Dainty Lil Ladies Not so short 1.7 compatible version so the ladies are not so amazingly short now!!  BaddaBoom BaddaBING!!  VARIETY!!!!  :D

Optional batch file to make your CUSTOM RACE female player character feel like she fits in: open console and type without quotes \"bat short\" or you can just use the console command without quotes \"player.setscale 0.8800\" 
Added Not so short bat file for your female player character if using the Not so short version, will make your character 0.92 tall like other Nord/Imperial females etc.  Again type bat short in console.

Your friend, 

The GR00VIEST GR00VYGH0ULIE

[img]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/6606/tesv2012090120410722.jpg[/img]

FYI:
All characters in screenshots have Bella\'s Better Faces and Geonox\'s High Res Face Maps for Men, Caliente\'s CBBE Body and BodySlide Compatible Townpersons Clothes and Bandit & Soldier Pack Armors, Lunari Race (First Version) for player character and various (too many to remember) high res texture packs and stuff!!  Using heavily modifed Akiro Undone ENB with CLO too!!  I like my Skyrim bright, vibrant & purty!!!  LOL!!!

Oh yeah, I use a custom NPC mod I made removing all dirt and changed hairstyles for main (ish) NPC\'s and making the females that are supposed to be young n hottish actually somewhat hot (IMHO) and making some of the males a little less generic and dorky.   If anyone wants it let me know!

[img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/4715/tesv2012090213510315.jpg[/img]

My Lunari player character Charlotte Sometimes (if ya know where the name is from you\'re ultra cool!!!) may be made a follower mod if enough people want!!
author: GR00VYGH0ULIE
